title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Gather and document the comprehensive requirements for the AugmentedWorkspace project. Identify key stakeholders, conduct interviews or workshops to capture their needs, expectations, and pain points. Ensure all desired features are listed, along with target platforms (e.g., iOS, Android, VR/AR headsets), user personas, technical constraints, non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, accessibility, usability, maintainability, and testability. The final document will serve as the basis for further project planning and development. In addition, consider potential integration with other systems or APIs, outline any necessary research or experimentation that may be required to support the project's objectives, and provide a detailed plan for integrating user feedback throughout the development process. Also, consider the long-term maintenance and evolution of the system, including strategies for updates and feature enhancements. The document will be updated regularly as new insights and requirements emerge. In case any dependencies arise during the research phase, they should be promptly added to this task.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for augmented reality, workspace customization, and user interaction.

title: Develop Augmented Reality Engine
description: Implement the augmented reality engine responsible for rendering virtual objects and environments on top of the real-world space.

title: Create Workspace Customization Interface
description: Develop the user interface and tools for customizing the virtual workspace, including the ability to add, remove, and arrange virtual objects.

title: Implement User Interaction and Controls
description: Develop the user interaction mechanisms and controls for navigating and interacting with the augmented workspace.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for storing and retrieving user workspace configurations and settings.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure the system's integrity.

title: Create Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan to ensure the system's functionality, performance, and user experience.

title: Plan Deployment and DevOps Strategy
description: Define the deployment strategy and DevOps processes for building, testing, and releasing the AugmentedWorkspace system.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation, tutorials, and training materials to assist users in effectively utilizing the AugmentedWorkspace system.
